definitions.text: time during which some action is awaited
examples: instant replay caused too long a delay
he ordered a hold in the action

definitions.text: the act of delaying; inactivity resulting in something being put off until a later time
cause to be slowed down or delayed
examples: Traffic was delayed by the bad weather
she delayed the work that she didn't want to perform

definitions.text: act later than planned, scheduled, or required
examples: Don't delay your application to graduate school or else it won't be considered

definitions.text: slow the growth or development of
examples: The brain damage will retard the child's language development
